message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple beginning!
You got 60% of the initial offer, I'll take 40. Let's see if you can do better!
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I'm still not giving up my majority share. Can you do better than this?
You're still holding back, I'll take a slightly larger share this time. Don't think you're getting the better end of the deal!
